definitions.definition: Any psychoactive substance (such as LSD or psilocybin ) which, when consumed , causes perceptual changes (sometimes erratic and uncontrollable ), visual hallucination , and altered awareness of the body and mind .

main_definition: Any psychoactive substance (such as LSD or psilocybin ) which, when consumed , causes perceptual changes (sometimes erratic and uncontrollable ), visual hallucination , and altered awareness of the body and mind .
